parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Engine Failure due to Porous Block
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine failure can cause the vehicle to stall, leading to accidents or loss of control, especially at high speeds.
symptoms: white smoke coming from the engine.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the Mass Air Flow Sensor can cause the engine to stall, leading to accidents or loss of control, especially at high speeds.
Drive belt failure can cause the engine to overheat, leading to stalling or engine failure, which can result in accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: white smoke coming from the engine

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Engine fire can cause the vehicle to be completely destroyed, leading to accidents or loss of life.
The sudden and unexpected shattering of the sunroof can cause a loud noise, distraction, and potentially lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The sunroof explodes or shatters without any apparent reason
such as a rock or item hitting the car

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unfair and deceptive business practices of requiring a large cash down payment can cause financial distress, stress, and potentially lead to unfair contract terms.
symptoms: Dealerships request a large cash down payment
and may use high-pressure sales tactics to convince the buyer to comply.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Faulty Display Control Units (DCUs) Causing Infotainment System Malfunctions
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty DCUs can cause distractions while driving, override user controls, and lead to safety issues due to malfunctioning reverse cameras.
symptoms: plays or pauses music or sounds
and causes severe distractions while driving. The reverse camera may display no image
and may stay on the screen while moving forward.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunctioning occupant sensor can cause the airbag system to remain off, putting the safety of passengers at risk in the event of an accident.
symptoms: The airbag passenger light is illuminated
the vehicle's diagnostic system detects an occupant sensor malfunction.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the airbag system can cause the airbag warning light to illuminate, and the vehicle to hesitate or stall, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
The failure of the rearview camera system can reduce the driver's visibility, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries when reversing.
symptoms: The back-up screen does not display while the gear is in reverse

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Run-Flat Tire Failure and Safety Concerns
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of run-flat tires can lead to accidents, strandings, and hazardous situations, especially in areas with limited service station availability.
symptoms: Tires go flat due to potholes
and there is no spare tire option.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the serpentine belt can cause engine damage, overheating, and loss of power steering and brakes, leading to accidents or leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The serpentine belt snaps while driving
resulting in engine damage or loss of power steering and brakes.
